title: EMISSION OF ARCS OR SPARKS
fullText:
Where arcs or sparks might be emitted by permanently connected electrical equipment in normal service, the electrical equipment shall beâ€”
(a) totally enclosed in arc-resistant material;
(b) screened by arc-resistant material from building elements on which the arcs could have deleterious thermal effects; or
(c) mounted at sufficient distance from building elements on which the arcs or sparks could have deleterious thermal effects, to allow safe extinction of the arcs or sparks.
